description:
Decentralized, open-source (MIT), C/C++ package manager.

### Package Specific
#### Package Parameters

The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/PathType:['User'|'Machine'|'Process']: Which PATH to add it to. If specifying 'Machine', this requires admin privileges to run correctly.`
displayName: Conan - The open-source C/C++ package manager
author: Conan.io
